casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
David Allen SNYDER, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 153696
COA: 325449 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 22, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Criminal Defense Attorneys of Michigan to extend the time for filing a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on February 15, 2019, is accepted for filing.
